==Useful Info==
'''Crystal echidnas''' are found in the [[Iron City of Dis]]. They can fire both barbs and bolts of crystal.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*By the time you're in [[extended]], crystal echidnas shouldn't be much of a threat by themselves. However, they can make you [[fragile]] with their [[Crystallizing Shot]]s.
*Crystal echidnas are susceptible to [[LRD]] and [[Shatter]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.32]], crystal echidnas had [[Crystal Bolt]] instead of [[Crystallizing Shot]].
*Crystal echidnas were added in [[0.28]].
